TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Secretary of War and Marine, 06-10-2010

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Secretary of War and Marine, June 10, 1829. Acknowledging thanks of the Secretary for services of the colonists in defending the coast from the Spaniards. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 223

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Secretary of War and Marine, June 10, 1829. Acknowledging thanks of the Secretary for services of the colonists in defending the coast from the Spaniards. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[San Felipe] *date_mentioned n="06-10-1829">June 10,1829.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar*/p*
*/div1*
